Package usecases

Class GameTemplate

  • java.lang.Object
    • usecases.GameTemplate
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Bura, CrazyEights, GoFish, War
    public abstract class GameTemplate
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class on which games are built. Contains methods that all games will need to use in their implementation and interacts with the stats of the Users who play the game.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  GameTemplate.AbortGameException
      AbortGameException should be thrown when a game is forcibly terminated.

        Construct a GameTemplate.

        usernames - usernames of those playing the game

                                       UserManager userManager,
                                       GameIO gameIO)
        Create a new GameTemplate instance based on the given game name
        Parameters:
        name - the game to create
        usernames - list of usernames to play the game
        userManager - user management vessel
        gameIO - gameIO object for input to and output from the game
        Returns:
        the requested game instance
